downscroll: Places gray notes at bottom of the screen.
ghostTapping: If you press a key and there aren't notes to press, you miss.
hitsound: When you press a note, a satisfying sound plays.
ultra-optimize: Deletes the characters and the background for better performance.
note-splashes: Spawns a fancy splash when you hit a 'Sick'.
background-opacity: Adds a black screen behind your notes to hide the background to see them better.
flashing-menu: Toggle the flashing lights for photosensitive people.
antialiasing: Without antialiasing, theres better performance but the game looks worse.
camera-zoom: Toggle the camera zooms on a song beat.
fps-counter: Toggle the visiblity of the FPS counter.
auto-pause: Auto pauses the game when it doesn't have focus.
allowReset: Allow die on game with the R key.
freeplayPlay: Press SPACE to preview the song.
freeplayPlayMobile: Press PLAY BUTTON to preview the song.
